title: Need help finding prospect email list for cold email campaign - Ongoing project
snippet:
This is long term contract for $40/month budget. Before start this, I need to test by hiring multiple applicant freelance for small one-time fee $5 and you need to deliver email list as follow requirement below. I will pick only one freelance for this long-term project.

I need freelance to find prospect email list for my cold email campaign every month. The list should not duplicate, I need to get new email list every month.

My business is SEO hosting company. So I need to find email list for potential client. For example

1. People who in charge in SEO department for company
2. SEO professionals
3. Decision maker in SEO services company
4. Decision maker in Private blog network creation service

Budget is $40 per month. I am expecting only one freelance who can do this long term. So I need freelance who experts in data/email scraping, linkedin scraping, lead generation, cold email etc.

Freelance have to deliver csv file of email along with detail eg., website, person name, company they work with, city, country, title, category of list (it's seo company or seo professional or seo manager etc.)

I need reasonable number of list per month for $40 budget. Please also tell me about number of list you can provide per month.

Please mention word "zidit" when you are applying proposal
